name: Skulls and Scrolls WIP SGX Fall 2022
name_original: Skulls and Scrolls WIP SGX Fall 2022
description:
In this game, you are a magical skeleton defending your house from scavengers. You use the WASD keys to move. You use the mouse to look around. You can left click to fire a projectile that kills enemies. Use the spacebar to jump and if you press space again while in the air you can double jump once. 

Your goal is to protect the intact house you spawn near from enemies. If you defeat 20 enemies you will win the game. If you cannot defend the house, you will lose.
